ygData.subject: RE: Binding in Ogguk
ygData.msgSnippet: I noticed Ogguk has become increasingly easy to visit since the guards are getting killed regularly.  Watch out though, I have seen a merchant stuck in the
ygData.messageBody:
I noticed Ogguk has become increasingly easy to visit since the guards are
getting killed regularly. Watch out though, I have seen a merchant stuck in
the front area before and those will whip you like a goblin whelp if you
appear near them.

Kit

Also the flute will likely be gone shortly after you enter Cazic

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 1:08 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Binding in Ogguk


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> I've been thinking that the next time I fight in Cazic I will get bound in
> Ogguk. Assuming no one picks it up and takes it, I plan on leaving a
spare
> flute right at the zone so I can safely get back to Cazic without aggroing
a
> guard. Key issue is how long will the flute stay on the ground before it
> decays?

I had no problems being bound in Oggok when making the PoF run.
The flute will disappear as quick as anything else would. 5 mins?
I dunno, drop some foraged grubs on the ground and start a timer.

Harmonic.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
